column4: it most likely that you are not seeing events not that it is not logging them - I do not remember which file it is that you have to edit  but search the forums or google - it is a rather standard problem with firestarter
Firestarter Error. Failed to open system log. ...
most people will tell you to not use firestarter but if you want to see events as they happen you will have to uncomment a few lines (just do not remember which file).
